website_summaries.verdict: Despite only occasional mechanical issues and the high price tag, it's worth considering for anyone who wants a white electric range with ceramic cook top and convection function.
pros: A fast-cooking convection range that features large 6.1 cubic foot size that's suitable for avid cooks and large families
Smooth ceramic cooktop is easy to clean, and is also white for a seamless look
cons: Rare reports of issues with the convection fan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Expert delivery, installation and haul away by Amazon. The entire process took less than 30 minutes (the installers gave me a few minutes to vacuum and mop the space before bringing in the new range). Everything necessary for the install was included in the base price. The range is clean, unobtrusive and intuitive (I haven't had to crack the manual open yet). Having the knobs and display panel on the front of the range is new for me and I love it. I keep burning everything because I am so used to having an old ill-performing range. Now, food actually cooks in the time stated in my recipes. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Blue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this oven!!! So easy to keep the stove top clean. The elements heat up quickly and evenly.
customer_reviews.author: patricia wharton

customer_reviews.title: Serious design flaw
customer_reviews.text: This oven has a serious flaw. The front of the oven door near the handle gets extremely hot and upwards of 200 degrees when using the oven for more than 15 mins. Even normal size hands will touch this part of the oven when grasping the handle, and it has burned me a few times now. It seems like the inside of the door isn’t insulated well, which collects tons of heat and then vents near the handle. Terrible design and dangerous!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Williams

customer_reviews.title: This was amazing!. I couldn't believe the easy purchase and ...
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing! . I couldn't believe the easy purchase and delivery. The price was wonderful and it included delivery and removal of old range. The guys that delivered our range were the best. They were in and out within 20 minutes. i purchased a five year warranty, which I recommend. The range itself is a great buy. We are retired and don't need a huge oven anymore. We use the smaller top oven and broiler all the time . Still love it after a month !
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful, cooks great.
customer_reviews.text: The one improvement could be racks that slide out easily. I love my stove. I am experienced with cleaning the top, and find this one easy to clean. I love the black stainless. You just wipe it clean (no polish). Depending on how wet you wipe it, might need to dry it with a soft cloth. Top burners heat up fast. Top oven preheats fast. Haven't used the bottom oven yet. I've used the stove for a month now. Looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Keep Top Looking Clean
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical of buying an appliance from Amazon but when the local stores couldn't deliver for 3 weeks, I thought, "Why not?" The guys that delivered were very respectful and fast. Great experience. I do not however, like the top of this stove. It's black and needs to be wiped down several times a day. It also scratches easily. My old flat top was grey speckled and much easier to keep clean looking. The display only reads the time when the oven is on. My old stove showed both the oven temp and either the timer or the current time. I would still buy this product based on ease of delivery and cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Florinki

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had my 35-yr-old range back!
customer_reviews.text: This thing's oven takes more than twice as long as my old range to heat up. Someone told me it uses about 1/2 the electricity; how is that an advantage if it takes twice as long? And when boiling on the stove top, it never gets as hot as the old stove. Many recipes say "Bring water to a rolling boil, then..." That took a few minutes on the old stove. This thing never gets to a true rolling boil. It gets to what I guess you would call a gentle boil, bubbles a little and gets no hotter. According to the manual, it's also very delicate and fragile. The old one was rugged.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Deacon

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The range arrived undamaged and was installed with no problems. Works fine, there is a little buzzing noise when the power is on, this was not such an issue as not very loud. Heats very fast, as did my previous Frigidaire Cooktop. I like that the controls are up at the back instead of being on the surface of the items, no need to lock when cleaning the top. Oven works well, seems to heat evenly. All in all happy with this item, price was reasonable and delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.author: alleah

customer_reviews.title: Makes Cooking Fun Again
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stove!!!!!! Had used an induction stove in Europe and really liked it because 1) it heats the food/water/etc. extremely fast thereby reducing cooking and energy use time 2) saves money 3) the stove doesn't get hot so when something boils over it's easy to clean up 4) because the stove doesn't get as hot as normal stoves you don't have to worry as much about burning yourself on the element. The heat goes from the stove to the bottom of the pan/skillet. So very glad our old stove finally "bit the dust" and we could buy this stove. Did I mention it has 5 burners? Another plus.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: WOWZA!
customer_reviews.text: Holy mackerel! $600 cheaper than Lowes, free delivery and removal, cord included, not a bad deal. Stove and ovens work perfectly with little transition from my old crappy stove. I'm very pleased with the Kenmore. Consumer Reports routinely chooses Kenmore as a best buy and good value and this stove is no exception. Burners heat up and cool down rapidly, ditto the ovens. The warm burner is a great bonus. Love this unit!
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This oven heats up quickly and cooks everything so evenly. I've baked and cooked in it and everything has been done at the exact time stated in the recipe. It also looks soo pretty. I have no problem cleaning up the cooktop with an electric cooktop cleaner and polishing it so it looks like brand new again. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: What a deal
customer_reviews.text: This is our first purchase on line for any type of appliance and we were both happily surprised with the delivery process very professional and helpful didn't have to do a thing other than direct them here and open the door. The range itself is high quality and works like a Kenmore should.. Self cleaning feature and convection feature works like a charm. Quickly boil anything as a special feature is awesome..
customer_reviews.author: Steven W. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this Stove!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer an electric stove and this one has four burners and a warming zone. One of the burners heats to boiling very quickly, which is a nice feature. Another burner accommodates three different size pans. The oven is roomy and has three racks. The bottom drawer that is usually for storage is actually a warming drawer. Installation was quick and they hauled the old one away. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Schliesman

customer_reviews.title: Delivery is not timely. They were deceptive.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was not on time for each time “they” rescheduled.” First delivery didn't show, I had to call and ask why it showed that I rescheduled. Second delivery was to be in the morning, it didn't show till after 4 p.m. I lost $300 wages from work in two days waiting for delivery. Scraped blemish on front of oven. Buying food out is not cheap for a family, add another $150. Glad to be able to cook again, that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Fireblossom65

customer_reviews.title: Decent range for price
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this range- it is inexpensive and overall, looks nice so an easy upgrade. However, when the oven is on, the outside of the oven gets really hot. As in, so hot is makes me nervous with my young kids. Otherwise, the range has cooked very well, baking evenly and the elements get hot quickly.
customer_reviews.author: aih

customer_reviews.title: Great product great delivery!
customer_reviews.text: I got the slide in range. It is beautiful! Looks so much better than what I had before. The delivery guys were great they even hauled my old stove away. I was very impressed with Amazon’s appliance delivery program. They took care of everything. I would definitely recommend this way of purchasing appliances. Even an appliance store I just bought a refrigerator from wouldn’t even help me move my fridge out of the way!!! They said it was a liability thing, even though they brought in a new fridge that was twice the size of my old one... makes no sense.
customer_reviews.author: brittany vigneault

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: After running the oven at 350 for 30 minutes as instructed, none of the heating elements work in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Back Alley Deals

customer_reviews.title: Kenmore Elite Induction Range is great.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this range a while back and just love it. The induction stove top is wonderful! We do not have a gas hookup so always had electric stoves prior to this one even though I prefer gas. The induction works very much like gas. The heat is OFF when you turn it off and the stove top does not stay hot. It also heats extremely fast if you need it to. I love it and recommend induction stove tops to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: diane lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great Installers And Free Haul Away of The Old Stove
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a GE that had problems over the years. Very happy with the price, the stove, quick delivery, and excellent installation service. One tip -- new ovens need to be run to get rid of that new equipment odor. The manual in our case was a bit optimistic about how long this takes. (-8
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Good service and delivery
customer_reviews.text: You may want to make sure they will have the plug. It isn't explicitly listed and they seemed to imply they were helping me out by letting me have it. It was odd. The oven was in good shape and they set it up. We are happy with it so far. I like that it has the warming drawer and displays numbers for the level of induction unlike the GE profile.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Great Stove..Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great Stove. Love The Convection oven, Heats up Very Fast & The Rapid Boil Burner on Glass Top....Plus Amazon Hooked up Stove and Hauled my Old one away for Free !!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Alan Iles

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding stove insures chef-quality cooking
customer_reviews.text: This stove is top notch and deserves the high rating given by Consumer Reports. The double fans insure moist, flavorful poultry. The stovetop provides remarkable fast heating, warm-up and cooking. Warming drawer is of substantial metal. I love this stove. Wish I’d known sooner that Amazon sells appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R P

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: We needed it quick since ours broke and we had no way to cook. We got it fast, they hooked it up and made sure it worked and took our old one. We are very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice electric Range, delivery service was great !!! right on time and set everything up !!
customer_reviews.text: The electric Range looks good and I have no complaints at this point, I just received it, For 699 you cant beat it !!. I will keep you up dated as time goes on !! One thing for sure the delivery service was great !!! right on time and set everything up !!
customer_reviews.author: TRUTH

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a very good price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my new range. It does not have all the bells and whistles my old one had but it has some features my old one did not have. Very pleased with all aspects of this purchase. The delivery was as promised and the men were very efficient, kind and knowledgeable. Thanks Amazon and delivery folks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glass is hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I get people buy these glass tops for looks.....we cook here. It is near impossible to keep the glass clean when it is being used 3 times a day. Usability = 0 ... looks = 10!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hanser

customer_reviews.title: New stove broke down
customer_reviews.text: First person claimed no warranty came with expensive appliances purchased on Amazon. 2nd person at Sears told me the 1 year warranty expired a few days ago. The turbo boil burner burned out. 2nd problem in short time with the stove. 3rd person says there was a 90 day warranty on the stove that expired. Aren't we all exhausted from excuses?
customer_reviews.author: Eve Schatz

customer_reviews.title: The worst stove  ever
customer_reviews.text: What this means? I just bought this stove 4 months ago and I take care of it as you don’t imagine, some days after first use one of the circles had a scrape, and yesterday I was normally cooking and when I finished the top looks like in the picture, I don’t understand why? This is terrible quality
customer_reviews.author: Lorena M

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Had this stove for almost 1 year and I ran the self-cleaning function and now the oven does not work right. Have had repairman out 4x's and they replaced the main board and it still does not work right. Takes over 1 hour to preheat to 400 degrees. Not a happy camper at all!
customer_reviews.author: James Fore

customer_reviews.title: very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: i have had it about a month, very happy with it. induction is a better way to cook. the range is a good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: roy davey

customer_reviews.title: Amazon's delivery,  setup and removal of my old unit was 5 star service!
customer_reviews.text: I give it 4 stars because the cook top is hard to clean. Everything else is exactly what I wanted. Amazon's delivery, setup and removal of my old unit was 5 star service!
customer_reviews.author: Wags

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and crazy fast and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Fast and friendly installers. The stoves induction totally rocks!!!! Absolutely lovely and feeds a family of five readily. Quiet and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Great oven
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very durable. Very excited to have years of use
customer_reviews.author: Cheery

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for a Nice Range
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, looks great in our small condo kitchen. We really like it.
customer_reviews.author: BDA

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service
customer_reviews.text: I love this new range. It meets all my expectations. I especially appreciate the on-time delivery and the removing of my old range. The men were so kind, friendly and helpful. They were so careful and did a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Osborn

customer_reviews.title: haven" t tried the turbo cooking
customer_reviews.text: still getting used to it but it is really nice
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Betlow

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Glass is hard to keep clean, but that is going to happen with any glass top. Delivery and setup showed up a few hours earlier than scheduled.
customer_reviews.author: Howard G. Temple

customer_reviews.title: Great electric range and oven
customer_reviews.text: Love the flat burners and warmer. Love the ease of use and cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice oven/stove/range. Many nice features. Make sure you get the stuff to clean the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s Working
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat difficult to get the top cleaned. Small shallow grooves around the tops’s perimeter catch and hold small crumbs. Top heats well and even. Not much experience with the oven yet
customer_reviews.author: SDD

customer_reviews.title: heats soooo quick!
customer_reviews.text: exceptional heating, go so fast you can't believe. Great oven.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Hauck

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase this appliance again-can’t wait to replace
customer_reviews.text: No good features and oven takes forever to pre-heat. Both heating elements on front are large which is inconvenient as you need a small one for quick heating.
customer_reviews.author: Talonrest

customer_reviews.title: scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: Stainless scratches very easily when moving pans on/off stove or anywhere especially top front.
customer_reviews.author: monique almeida

customer_reviews.title: Terrible stove top
customer_reviews.text: Have had the stove for a year and the stove top is scratched and marked up! Would never by another or recommend it to anyone.. stove is rarely used terrible product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Everything went smoothly
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and wooks Great shipping was good as well.
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. The convection fans are a bit loud but ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. The convection fans are a bit loud but cooks very even and temp is dead on. The surface is a bit harder to clean than I thought it would be. Good purchase and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bruce J.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement
customer_reviews.text: I need help arranging a replacement for the stove that was delivered. It was damaged and replacement was agreed to but I've been on the road and too busy to make arrangements
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: So far so good - like the oven and the burners - only ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good - like the oven and the burners - only con - I hate the pull out drawer on the bottom, but that is often an issue with stoves.
customer_reviews.author: Lou W.

product_meta.title: Kenmore 6.4 cu. ft. Front Control Electric Range in Stainless Steel, includes delivery and hookup -2295123
product_meta.description: Color:Stainless Steel| Size:6.4 cu. ft.| Style:ElectricFunction and aesthetics come together in the Kenmore 6.4 Cubic Feet Slide-In Electric Range with Convection Oven. This standard slide-in electric range brings a sleek and modern look to your kitchen with its front touch and knob controls, making your cooking area more accessible no matter what kind of meal you're making. It provides plenty of room to cook dinner and dessert simultaneously with its large capacity oven and stovetop. Cook a holiday turkey in the oven, while you prepare mashed potatoes on the stovetop- you can do it all with this large capacity range. This 30" electric range includes three oven racks, so you can get cooking large holiday meals, or cupcakes with the kids. With True Convection, the oven uses a fan and a hidden third heating element to give you uniform heating throughout. With 5 sealed burners on the stovetop, you can whip up a gourmet meal anytime. A Turbo Boil burner provides express heating so you can boil pasta water in less time. The oven also offers a self-cleaning feature so you can cook more and clean less. This standard 30" range is electric and measures 30.0" W x 26.4" D x 36.0" H, and includes a storage drawer.
feature_bullets: SLIDE-IN RANGE: 6.4 cubic feet electric range brings a sleek and modern look to your kitchen with its slide-in design, and provides plenty of room to cook dinner and dessert simultaneously
LARGE CAPACITY RANGE: 30" gas range offers a large capacity kitchen stove for preparing holiday feasts or weeknight dinners for the family, and includes 3 racks for all your cooking needs
CONVECTION OVEN: Features True Convection that uses a fan and a hidden third heating element to give you uniform heating throughout
COOK MORE, CLEAN LESS: Features 5 burners, including a Turbo Boil burner, for convenient cooking of large meals, and self cleaning feature helps degrease and clean baked on messes from the oven
ELECTRIC RANGE DIMENSIONS: Measures 30.0" W x 26.4" D x 36.0" H, standard width is 30" and includes a storage drawer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars98 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
